author: bencomic

right.text: [chorus] Jux, the new household cleaner. I'll murder your family. / I can't seem to eat Chinese food without a sudden lapse in metricity.

left.text: [verse 1] Down in the funeral procession, I see a guy/ My lips are trembling, so are yours/ I can't find out the reason behind/ I see a panoramic view, but I can't seperate truth from fiction

right.text: [chorus 2] Jux, the new service professional. I'll extricate your beliefs. /  I can't seem to watch Japanese shows without a burst of pedophilia.

left.text: [verse 2] You and I are just sitting alone/ When the lights go out, ghosts appear/  I go through time, lost and lonely/ I can't seem to get the top off this bottle

right.text: kind of like nu-metal meets something even worse than nu-metal

left.text: [verse 3] red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red red. so guys what did you think of my lyrics

title: THAT'S IT MOMMY, GET READY TO DIE
